title: 181C.06 DISCRIMINATION PROHIBITED.
text:
(a) A TNC must not discriminate against a TNC driver or a qualified applicant to become a driver, due to race, national origin, color, creed, religion, sex, disability, sexual orientation, marital status, or gender identity as provided under section 363A.11. Nothing in this section prohibits providing a reasonable accommodation to a person with a disability, for religious reasons, due to pregnancy, or to remedy previous discriminatory behavior.
(b) A TNC driver injured by a violation of this section is entitled to the remedies under sections 363A.28 to 363A.35.
